content:
Hi All,
I'm trying to make some modifications in DaVinci CDex Communication request and response applications and I had some queries related to them. Is there anyone with knowledge of these DaVinci Applications.Please let me know.
Thanks in advance.
What are you trying to do? @Smitha Harish or @padma prabhavathi will be able to help with this. Could you please send out the queries that you have?

Hi @Sreekanth Puram we are trying to use this applications in our organization and we found the source code in github but in the sourcecode they had placed references of organization,practitioner and patient as static .We need to pick the references related to the situation. Is it possible??
